doc.title: Clarkesworld Magazine - Science Fiction & Fantasy
doc.author: Sergio Rebolledo
doc.excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: Warm by Sergio Rebolledo

main.p: 2011 Finalist: Chesley Award for Best Magazine Cover
Sergio Rebolledo is a 22-year-old graphic design student from Guadalajara, Jalisco, Mexico. He studies at the University of Guadalaja and looks forward to becoming a professional creative director.
ISSN 1937-7843 · Clarkesworld Magazine © 2006-2022 Wyrm Publishing. Robot illustration by Serj Iulian.
